column5: message
Fix broken Markdown headings

:wrench: Upgrade build dependencies

  - Android SDK 25
  - Android Build Tools 25.0.2
  - Android Support Library v25.3.0
  - Gradle Plugin v2.3.0

Use AppCompat resource for foreground (close #16)

It was using android resource, which is not available on old android versions
Add "snap" to toolbar scroll flags

Fix RecyclerView items issue wih new library version

Latest recyclerview library versions don't work very well with items that use match_parent for height instead of wrap_content.
Update dependency and gradle versions, and remove release signing config
Update README.md

Remove click delay (closes #6)

It was causing that some detail activities could be open in a short period of time, and provoked a problem in return animation. It seems it's no longer necessary to add a delay to be able to see the ripple, so just removed it.
Fix crash on avatar when finding view (closes #12)
Bump gradle and library versions to latest

Merge pull request #11 from rafaeltoledo/master

Fix project build on guest machines and update libraries
Added a default debug key, so build will not fail
Added Gradle wrapper exec files. Updated Gradle to 2.7, Support Libs to 23.0.1 and Picasso to 2.5.2

Merge pull request #8 from jpventura/issue-183166

Fix CoordinatorLayout NullPointerException in onTouchEvent.

Fix CoordinatorLayout NullPointerException in onTouchEvent.

Summary:
On some devices, a touch event triggered while the toolbar is half-way
collapsed, causes a NullPointerException.

This issue was detected after upgrading the support libraries to version 23 and
reported at Android Open Source Project issue tracker. For more information,
please check https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=183166.
Add GridLayoutAnimation to the RecyclerView.
Use CollapsingToolbarLayout in DetailsActivity
Use CoordinatorLayout and AppBarLayout to show and hide the Toolbar in Main Activity.
Update deprecated code.
Fix license year
Make use of FloatingActionButton from Design Support Library
Add drawer header background
Use of the new NavigationView in design support library to create a navigation drawer
